actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A resolution amending paragraphs 2 and 3(a) of Rule XXV and providing for certain appointments to the Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry Committee, the Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs Committee, the Finance Committee, the Small Business Committee, and the Veterans' Affairs Committee.
subjects: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

summary.text: Amends rule XXV of the Standing Rules of the Senate to increase the number of Senators on the: (1) Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry Committee from 18 to 20; (2) Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs Committee from 18 to 22; and (3) Veterans' Affairs Committee from 12 to 14.Provides for majority party appointments to the following committees: (1) Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry; (2) Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs; (3) Finance; (4) Small Business; and (5) Veterans' Affairs.Provides for minority party appointments to the following committees: (1) Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry; (2) Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs; and (3) Veterans' Affairs.

titles.title: A resolution amending paragraphs 2 and 3(a) of Rule XXV and providing for certain appointments to the Agriculture, Nutrition and Forestry Committee, the Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs Committee, the Finance Committee, the Small Business Committee, and the Veterans' Affairs Committee.
